data.title: Marvel Animation at the D23 Expo 2024
data.meta_description: The D23 Expo is this weekend! Here's a list of Marvel Animation related panels at this year's event. Keep in mind there might be announcements outside the...

Location

A Valid Location

Aug 5, 2024

#1

The D23 Expo is this weekend! Here's a list of Marvel Animation related panels at this year's event. Keep in mind there might be announcements outside the panels listed below (i.e., during the Marvel Studios or any other Disney Animation presentation).

Saturday August 10, 2024

Marvel Animation Sneak Peek

12:45 P.M., Premiere Stage

See what’s coming next to Disney+ from Marvel Animation, with special guests and first looks at hotly anticipated series including Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man, Eyes of Wakanda, future seasons of What If…?, X-Men ’97, and more!

Sunday August 11, 2024

Creating Marvel Studios & ILM Immersive’s What If...? – An Immersive Story

4:00 p.m., Backlot Stage

...

Until the Expo starts, feel free to discuss, add your hopes or predictions about what might be announced here. Once the event begins, please use this thread or any of the News & Discussion threads for the current Marvel projects, to post any of the news revealed at D23. (The news relevant to the Marvel shows will still be added to their respective News & Discussion threads afterwards, if only to have the topics more complete and up to date in regards to upcoming stuff.)

Also, if somehow any completely new projects are announced, expect new threads to be posted shortly afterwards on this very forum.

- What If? Season 3 News

Of those, only Eyes of Wakanda has any hope of containing content, characters which interest me; I do not, however, begrudge any of you your enthusiasm and excitement. "Play through!" LOL

#7

Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man footage is what I'm most keen on seeing. I've been eager to see how it looks in motion, for a long time. Of the forthcoming shows, It also seems like it will be the closest to an old school, bright colorful Marvel comic brought to life.

Eyes of Wakanda has me intrigued, with the word of mouth and rumors going around.

I'm just a little indifferent to Marvel Zombies at the moment.

It would be really cool if there are any surprise announcements but right now, I'd be happy with new animation, designs and images.

Last edited: Aug 9, 2024

I want some visuals, video or picture. Maybe some casting announcements and premiere dates. That's all I really need. Some new project announcements would really put me over.

On another note, I saw something Open Season related make it onto D+ recently. If they could permanently fix the Sony streaming arrangement, that would be wonderful. LOL I have one stubborn buddy that finally, after years, started watching Spectacular. Got halfway through before the Sony shows were pulled. He deserved that but I still wish it was all in one place again.

Saturday at 5:28 PM

#18

Hudson Thames will voice Peter/Spidey. Role reprisal from What If...?.

Peter & Norman's relationship is like a "What If?" scenario of Peter & Tony in the MCU. Difference is Norman uses more questionable methods.

First clip from the show reveals Peter gets his spider bite when Doctor Strange and Venom come through a portal fighting along with a spider.

Marvel Zombies will be a 4-episode event series rated "TV-MA".

First teaser shows Mandarin giving Shang-Chi the Ten Rings to save his arm from a zombie bite. Also included are Shang-Chi, Katy and Jimmy Woo fighting a Skrull biker gang, reminiscent of Mad Max sequence.

Yeah, no dates is kind of a letdown. Not as much as no official clips being released online, but still. Somehow I expected more from this event but it's not too bad, we did get a few intriguing tidbits I think.

EDIT:

ComicBook.com has a recap with a few more details.

Last edited: Saturday at 5:28 PM
